Name: Pattern Recognition - IND
Text: We are given an event log of three cases. Lets analyze the traces: Case 1: RA VF AE RMI VF AD SC AC Case 2: RA VF AE AD SC AC Case 3: RA VF AE RMI RMI VF AD SC AC

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Notice that after AE sometimes we have RMI which may be repeated followed by VF revalidation. Then we have AD SC AC. The main flow is RA VF AE optional RMI repetitions then VF AD SC AC

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: So the pattern is RA VF AE then optional one or more RMI then VF or nothing. So its a loop not exactly a loop in the sense of doing something multiple times and then having a fixed part. The fixed part VF only occurs if there was at least one RMI.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The loop operator is defined as A executed then either you exit the loop or you execute B and then A again this can happen several times until the loop is exited. This means Do A. Then choose exit or do B and then A again.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: We can set A to RMI and B to tau. Then first RMI. Then exit or do tau and then RMI again. This would allow One RMI exit after the first RMI. Two RMI do first RMI then tau and then RMI again. The tau is silent and not recorded. So in the event log we see two consecutive RMI events. That matches.

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: But wait the main flow is RA VF AE etc. But we did RA in parallel with the rest However in the log RA is the first event. But the rest of the activities are after RA So we dont want concurrency. Therefore the entire process should be a sequence of the activities

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: So the structure after AE is XOR tau -> * RMI tau VF The entire process tree root SEQUENCE with children RA VF AE XOR_node AD SC AC where XOR_node XOR with children tau and SEQUENCE with LOOP RMI tau and VF

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: root SEQUENCE children leaf RA leaf VF leaf AE XOR_node leaf AD leaf SC leaf AC XOR_node XOR children leaf tau SEQUENCE children LOOP_node leaf VF LOOP_node LOOP children leaf RMI leaf tau

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Let me validate with the traces Case 1 RA VF AE then the XOR chooses the second branch then we do the loop part first RMI then exit the loop then VF Then AD SC AC matches. Case2 RA VF AE then XOR chooses the first branch tau so we skip the block Then AD SC AC. Case3 RA VF AE then the XOR chooses the second branch loop RMI then tau and RMI then exit then VF Then AD SC AC But note in the loop we have two RMI and one tau The tau is silent. So the trace we see two RMI in a row Then VF. So the model works.
